episodes.title: Kamp Krusty
episodes.plot: Bart and Lisa attend "Kamp Krusty" but it is nothing like they thought it would be; Homer's hair grows back and he loses weight while the kids are away.

episodes.title: A Streetcar Named Marge
episodes.plot: Marge stars in a musical adaptation of A Streetcar Named Desire, but is angry with Homer's lack of interest; Maggie squares off with her strict new daycare owner.

episodes.title: Homer the Heretic
episodes.plot: Homer decides to stay at home every Sunday while the rest of the family continues to attend church, and soon finds himself in an ominous situation.

episodes.title: Lisa the Beauty Queen
episodes.plot: Homer enters Lisa in the Little Miss Springfield pageant to build her self-esteem.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror III
episodes.plot: An evil Krusty the Clown doll tries to kill Homer; Marge is captured by a giant ape who falls in love with her; Bart inadvertently raises the dead.

episodes.title: Itchy & Scratchy: The Movie
episodes.plot: With Bart continually getting in trouble, Homer bans him from seeing the new Itchy & Scratchy movie.

episodes.title: Marge Gets a Job
episodes.plot: When Marge takes a job at the power plant, Mr. Burns falls in love with her; Bart "cries wolf" to avoid taking a test.

episodes.title: New Kid on the Block
episodes.plot: Bart develops a crush on his new neighbor, only to discover that she's dating Jimbo Jones; Homer sues an all-you-can-eat restaurant after he's kicked out.

episodes.title: Mr. Plow
episodes.plot: Homer opens a successful snow-plowing business, only to inspire Barney to start a rival outfit that puts him out of work.

episodes.title: Lisa's First Word
episodes.plot: While trying to coax Maggie into saying her first word, Homer and Marge talk about how Lisa spoke hers.

episodes.title: Homer's Triple Bypass
episodes.plot: Years of poor eating habits catch up with Homer when he suffers a massive heart attack, but the family can't afford the triple bypass operation he needs.

episodes.title: Marge vs. the Monorail
episodes.plot: After receiving a considerable donation of money, Springfield builds a monorail system with Homer as the conductor, unaware they've just boarded a one-way train to Hell.

episodes.title: Selma's Choice
episodes.plot: Selma starts to feel broody, but after taking Bart and Lisa to Duff Gardens, she changes her mind.

episodes.title: Brother from the Same Planet
episodes.plot: When Bart gets tired of Homer's horrible parenting skills, he enrolls in the "Bigger Brother" program where he's assigned a fantastic role model.

episodes.title: I Love Lisa
episodes.plot: Lisa gives Ralph a Valentine's card out of pity, but soon regrets it when he develops an unwanted crush on her.

episodes.title: Duffless
episodes.plot: After Homer loses his license for DUI, Marge pressures him to give up beer for a month; Lisa attempts to prove that Bart is less intelligent than a hamster.

episodes.title: Last Exit to Springfield
episodes.plot: When Mr. Burns revokes the plant's dental plan, forcing Lisa to be fitted with cheap, ugly braces, Homer leads its union into going on strike.

episodes.title: So It's Come to This: A Simpsons Clip Show
episodes.plot: As Homer recovers in hospital due to Bart's disastrous April Fool's Day prank, the family reminiscences over earlier hardships.

episodes.title: The Front
episodes.plot: Bart and Lisa convince Grampa to let them use his name for episodes of "Itchy and Scratchy" they have written; Homer re-takes a test he failed in high school.

episodes.title: Whacking Day
episodes.plot: Marge home-schools Bart after he is expelled from Springfield Elementary; Lisa protests a barbaric local holiday centered around clubbing snakes to death.

episodes.title: Marge in Chains
episodes.plot: A misunderstanding leads to Marge being imprisoned for shoplifting, with her absence soon descending the family, and eventually, the town into chaos.

episodes.title: Krusty Gets Kancelled
episodes.plot: When Krusty's show is canceled after losing viewers to a ventriloquist and his dummy, Bart and Lisa organize a celebrity-filled comeback special for their favorite Clown.
